mapper.insert: insert into panda_product(category_sub, product_nm, product_price, product_at_no, product_comment, product_count) values(concat(concat(#{categorySub},'-'),nextval(seq_category)) , #{productNm}, #{productPrice}, nextval(seq_product_at_no), #{productComment},#{productCount})
insert into panda_attachment(attachment_name, attachment_type, attachment_size, attachment_date) values(#{attachmentName}, #{attachmentType},#{attachmentSize}, now())
mapper.select: select product_no as productNo, category_sub as categorySub, product_nm as productNm, product_price as productPrice, product_at_no as productAtNo, product_comment as productComment, product_count as productCount from panda_product where product_no = #{productNo}
